title: Application
fullText:
The particular requirements of this Standard replace, modify, or are additional to the general requirements of AS/NZS 3000 for the electrical wiring of connectable electrical installations.
This Standard may be applied through legislative requirements, made in each State and Territory of Australia and in New Zealand, concerned with the safety of electrical installations. This Standard may also be applied in conjunction with any additional requirements, exemptions or restrictions in such legislation.
